var photoGallery460= {"Album": {"title":"Homepage Photo Gallery","description":"","transitiondelay":"5","fadestyle":"NO","gallerywidth":"1000","backgroundaudio":"/cms/lib/VA01918668/Centricity/ModuleInstance/437/","loopaudio":"False","lgpath":"/cms/lib/VA01918668/Centricity/ModuleInstance/437/large/","tnpath":"/cms/lib/VA01918668/Centricity/ModuleInstance/437/thumbs/","Images": [{"photoname":"VA Secretary of Education, Atif Qarni, visits KQES!","src":"IMG_7047.JPG?rnd=0.845544841068585","caption":"Mr. Atif Qarni, spent time reading to KQES students today.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQPS Wins 2 Awards at VSBA Conference","src":"IMG_2554b.jpeg?rnd=0.826348539360961","caption":"KQPS won a 1st place award in recognition of the Green Schools Challenge and special recognition of Excellence in Risk Management.","pause":"","link":"https://www.kqps.net/site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=81&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=712&PageID=1","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Virginia is for Learners Day Celebrated at LMES","src":"70772413_130710771611564_7899315498754506752_n.jpg?rnd=0.338927942485981","caption":"Teachers at LMES show off their support for Virginia is for Learners Day. ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQPS Spelling Bee Champion Crowned!","src":"IMG-2131.jpg?rnd=0.275525888556394","caption":"Owen Keating, KQES 7th grader, wins KQPS division spelling bee.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"LMES Wins the Tiger Bowl at this years Community Pride Day!","src":"Resized.jpg?rnd=0.0711762882169226","caption":"“The Tiger Bowl” took place on CHS’s football field Saturday afternoon, where Lawson-Marriott Elementary School played King and Queen Elementary School in an annual flag football game. LMES defeated King and Queen Elementary School 29-14. It was an exciting game!","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQPS School Board Recognizes Mrs. Redd","src":"IMG-1016a.jpg?rnd=0.963474463654437","caption":"The KQPS School Board gave special recognition to Mrs. Redd for all of her contributions and hard work for a successful Community Pride Day at this months school board meeting. ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"CTE Department at CHS shows off mapping technology","src":"Sandbox1.jpg?rnd=0.757504206969172","caption":"Mr. Talbott showing students how technology can automatically calculate depth for mapping. ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQPS School Board Recognizes Mr. Harvey as CHS Alum of the Month","src":"image a.jpg?rnd=0.965023989772901","caption":"The KQPS School Board recognized Mr. Harvey for all his contributions to the KQPS Community as an Alum of CHS at this months school board meeting. ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Author Michelle Nelson-Schmidt visits KQPS!","src":"IMG_3901.JPG?rnd=0.53512869381119","caption":"Ms. Michelle Nelson-Schmidt met and read to students at both LMES and KQES.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQPS School Board recognizes our school principals.","src":"IMG-1001.JPG?rnd=0.15275755298918","caption":"October is National Principals Month! Our KQPS School Board recognized our school principals, Mr. Preston McKellar (CHS), Ms. Jennifer Perry (LMES), and Ms. Allison Jordan (KQES) for their dedication to KQPS.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"National School Bus/Car Driver Week!","src":"IMG-1002.JPG?rnd=0.851508018025899","caption":"Our KQPS School Board and Director of Transportation recognized all of our bus and car drivers at the last KQPS School Board meeting.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQES Student excited to be at school","src":"duwayne.jpg?rnd=0.323813866509038","caption":"KQES student excited about learning at school ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQPS School Board Recognized CHS Asst. Principal","src":"IMG-0997.JPG?rnd=0.0736680077731926","caption":"October is National Principals Month! Our KQPS School Board recognized Ms. Ashley Reynolds, CHS Asst. Principal for her hard work and dedication to KQPS.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQES Students working with their teacher","src":"kqes.3.JPG?rnd=0.822056586771298","caption":"KQES students are learning math with their teacher.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQES Students ","src":"kqes.5.JPG?rnd=0.91871253816351","caption":"KQES students working in different stations to get classowork completed.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Virginia is for Learners Day Celebrated at KQES","src":"70841939_130717994944175_8153263385820004352_n.jpg?rnd=0.204168974051331","caption":"Teachers at KQES celebrate Virginia is for Learners Day.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"LMES Staff with Dr. Adolph Brown","src":"IMG_3713.JPG?rnd=0.96704739842892","caption":"Dr. Adolph Brown gave a mesmerizing speech at KQCPS 2019 Convocation. ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Virginia's First Lady Visits KQPS","src":"IMG-2029.JPG?rnd=0.687479415762927","caption":"Mrs. Pamela Northam, First Lady of Virginia, read to several classes at LMES. ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Miss Virginia visits LMES and KQES","src":"Miss VA website.jpg?rnd=0.127174723486963","caption":"Miss Virginia, Emili McPhail, with a class at LMES.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"2019 National Teacher of the Year at CHS Graduation","src":"IMG_7907.JPG?rnd=0.411752220900614","caption":"Mr. Rodney Robinson, 2019 National Teacher of the Year, delivered the commencement address at the 2019 CHS graduation ceremony.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"KQPS Division Spelling Bee","src":"IMG-2136.jpg?rnd=0.807082253418435","caption":"All the students with administration who qualified for the KQPS Division Spelling Bee.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"}]}}
